name: mvccore/ext-controller-datagrid
description: MvcCore - Extension - Controller - DataGrid - extension to define and render datagrid component by model class.

suggest.mvccore/ext-model-db-*: MvcCore model extension to work with database SQL queries in more comfortable API.
suggest.mvccore/ext-tool-ts-generator: MvcCore tools extension to easilly generate TypeScript classes, interfaces or enums from PHP equivalents.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form: MvcCore extension to create custom filter form.
suggest.mvccore/ext-form-field-*: MvcCore form extension to create custom filter form fields.
suggest.mvccore/ext-cache-*: MvcCore cache extensions to speed up operations driven by class anotations.
